name: rankonid

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c0))
-| wi(wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), c0), wcel(c0, cdm(cr1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ dom(R1)↔(rank ` c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(R1)→(rank ` c0)= c0)
⊣ ((rank ` c0)= c0 → c0 ∈ dom(R1))

comment: The rank of an ordinal number is itself. Proposition 9.18 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79 and its converse. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
